name: Technopole Existence
description:
Technopole Existence

Technopole Existence is a story-driven psychological horror RPG, in which the player takes control of Tsuna, a girl who can traverse between the real and the digital world, with only one purpose. To save the real world from total extinction.

Collect digital energy from the real world computers and traverse into the dark and surreal digital world in order to search and take down the evil Viruses, within a limited amount of time.

Will the real you be...you?
